author: paulhauner
content:
We just pushed our public testnet docs/posts:

- Blog post: https://lighthouse.sigmaprime.io/update-19.html
- Onboarding: https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/become-a-validator.html
- Release: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/releases/tag/v0.1.0

It's mainnet with 16k validators, we're still working out some stalls and slow speeds in syncing, but making progress.

author: m.kalinin
content: that's amazing! will it be possible to track progress of that network via etherscan?
